org.mitre.mat.core
Class MATDocument

java.lang.Object
  org.mitre.mat.core.MATDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
MATDocumentInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MATJSONDocument
public class MATDocument
extends java.lang.Object
implements MATDocumentInterface

The object which embodies a MAT document. Each document contains a signal, a set of annotation types (Atype instances), and a dictionary mapping Atypes to the Lists of actual annotations of that type in the document, as well as a repository for arbitrary data (the metaData). Each annotation type has a label and a sequence of attributes, and each annotation contains a sequence of values which correspond in order to the attributes in the appropriate Atype. For examples of use, see the package.

See Also:
org.mitre.mat.core

findAtypeOfType

protected Atype findAtypeOfType(java.lang.String type)
Find the Atype whose label is given. If the Atype does not exist in the local annotation type repository, and there is a global annotation type repository available, the Atype will be copied from the global to the local repository if it is found in the global repository.

Parameters:
type - the Atype type (label) of the desired Atype.
Returns:
the Atype (or null if not found)
